google_play_reviews.content: Just downloaded this app. I actually love it. It's simple, straight to the point and easy to use. The way a tasks planner or to do list should be. Am only giving it a 4 star instead of 5 because of one issue. You can't rearrange your tasks to place which one comes first or last. If that feature can be added it would be great!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your wonderful feedback and for choosing our app! We're delighted to hear you love its simplicity and ease of use. Great news: we've recently added the ability to rearrange tasks. Please update the app to enjoy this new feature. Your input is invaluable in our continuous improvement!

google_play_reviews.content: Absolutely love it so far, I have issues listing out tasks and this sets it all up in a free, simple, easy to use and completely ad-free format. The only thing is, I wish there was a way to duplicate tasks instantly, or even set them to happen for example every Monday, Wednesday, etc.
